issue.title: Remove rebate from product when canceled, and recalculate provide total rebate
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

When a product/diffusion is cancelled/rejected by provider, the rebate is not set to 0.
We have to set it to zero and recalculate total rebate for provider.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

This applies to manual and automatic mining
